description:
Velocity is an important metric to a lot of software teams, but in my
experience, it’s often been the most important metric to management —
often at the expense of missing out on the rest of the story. In this
talk, we'll explore Earned Business Value, Lead Time, and Cumulative
Flow to examine how these metrics might deliver additional insight into
teams' development lifecycles.

If you'd like to learn more about software metrics, I recommend these
two books:

-  `Software Development Metrics`_ by David Nicolette
-  `Agile Metrics in Action`_ by Christopher Davis

.. _Software Development Metrics: https://www.manning.com/books/software-development-metrics
.. _Agile Metrics in Action: https://www.manning.com/books/agile-metrics-in-action
title: Beyond Velocity: 3 Metrics for Engineering Team Success
